summary: LookyLoo - A frictionless media file sharing app where users can upload files and share them with anyone via links without requiring the recipient to have a wallet or login. The owner uses Internet Identity (IID2) for authentication.
architectural_notes: App uses Internet Identity (IID2) for owner authentication
Recipients do not need wallets or logins to access shared files
Deployed on Internet Computer with draft and production modes
Draft mode has temporary data; production mode has permanent data persistence
